name: @fp/core
description: Core functions and structures for functional programming.

scripts.build: npm run clean; rollup -c; npm run copy
scripts.copy: npm run copy:settings; npm run copy:docs; npm run copy:declaration
scripts.copy:docs: cp README.md dist/; cp CHANGELOG.md dist/
scripts.release: npm run build; cd dist/; npm publish --access public

author: Kapelianovych Yevhen
